short_summary: Purchase of 4 Standard Propeller Shaft Dynamometers
description: The Contractor must provide four new R33 shaft propeller dynamometers and cables that:\r\- meet specifications including torque, thrust, speed, sensitivity, and total length,\r\- be compatible with existing calibration jigs and procedures,\r\- include momentary overload Torque and Thrust capacity of ± 25%
full_summary:
# Purchase of Standard Propeller Shaft Dynamometers for Model Testing
==============================================

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) has released a tender announcement for the purchase of four (4) standard propeller shaft dynamometers for use in the model testing area.

## Tender Summary
---------------

* **Reference Number:** cb-737-75578419
* **Publication Date:** 2024-11-19
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-12-05T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-12-09
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-06-13
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and other applicable agreements

## Requirements
------------

The successful contractor must provide four new R33 shaft propeller dynamometers and cables that meet the following specifications:

* Measure torque to a maximum value of 15 Nm
* Measure thrust to a maximum value of 400 N
* Maximum speed of 3500 rpm
* Supply sensitivity of 2-8 AC or DC constant voltage
* Total length of less than 410 mm
* Non-linearity of 0.1% F.S.
* Momentary overload torque and thrust capacity of +/- 25%
* Must be compatible with existing calibration jigs and procedures

## Tender Evaluation
----------------

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest priced responsive bid that meets the requirements.

## Contact Information
-------------------

* **Contracting Entity:** National Research Council of Canada
* **Contact Name:** Carol Mary Cooper
* **Contact Email:** carol.cooper@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** 902-293-8053

## Tender Documents
-------------------

The tender documents are available on the Canadabuy website at the following links:

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52169/24-58257_acan_hr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52169/24-58257_acan_hr.pdf)
* French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52169/24-58257_avis-de-projet-d.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites
